verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H8064>"Heaven<s%> is my <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> is my <S%H7272>footstool:<s%> what kind of <S%H1004>house<s%> will you <S%H1129>build<s%> to <S%H4725>me?<s%> and what place shall be my <S%H4496>rest?<s%>

For all these things has my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H6213>made,<s%> and so all these things came to <S%H5002>be,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> "but to this man will I <S%H5027>look,<s%> even to him who is <S%H6041>poor<s%> and of a <S%H5223>contrite<s%> <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and who <S%H2730>trembles<s%> at my <S%H1697>word.<s%>

He who <S%H7819>kills<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%> is as he who <S%H5221>kills<s%> a <S%H376>man;<s%> he who <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> as he who <S%H6202>breaks<s%> a <S%H3611>dog<s%>'s <S%H6202>neck;<s%> he who <S%H5927>offers<s%> an <S%H4503>offering,<s%> as he who offers <S%H2386>pig<s%>'s <S%H1818>blood;<s%> he who <S%H2142>burns<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense,<s%> as he who <S%H1288>blesses<s%> an <S%H205>idol.<s%> <S%H977>Yes,<s%> they have chosen their own <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2654>delights<s%> in their <S%H8251>abominations:<s%>

I also will <S%H977>choose<s%> their <S%H8586>delusions,<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> their <S%H4035>fears<s%> on <S%H7121>them;<s%> because when I called, no one <S%H1696>answered;<s%> when I <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> they <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen; but they <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H977>chose<s%> that in which I <S%H2654>didn't<s%> delight."

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you who <S%H2730>tremble<s%> at his <S%H1697>word:<s%> "Your <S%H251>brothers<s%> who <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H5077>you,<s%> who cast you out for my <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H559>sake,<s%> have said, <S%H3068><s%> 'Let Yahweh be <S%H3513>glorified,<s%> that we may <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H8057>joy;<s%>' but it is those who shall be <S%H954>disappointed.<s%>

A <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7588>tumult<s%> from the <S%H5892>city,<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> from the <S%H1964>temple,<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> that <S%H7999>renders<s%> <S%H1576>recompense<s%> to his <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
"Before she <S%H2342>travailed,<s%> she brought <S%H3205>forth;<s%> before her <S%H2256>pain<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> she <S%H4422>delivered<s%> a <S%H2145>son.<s%>

Who has <S%H8085>heard<s%> such a <S%H7200>thing?<s%> who has seen such <S%H776>things?<s%> Shall a land be born in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day?<s%> shall a <S%H1471>nation<s%> be brought <S%H2342>forth<s%> at <S%H6471>once?<s%> for <S%H1571>as<s%> soon <S%H1571>as<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H2342>travailed,<s%> she brought <S%H3205>forth<s%> her <S%H1121>children.<s%>

Shall I bring to the <S%H7665>birth,<s%> and not cause to bring <S%H3205>forth?<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> "shall <S%H589>I<s%> who cause to bring <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H6113>shut<s%> the <S%H559>womb?<s%>" says your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H8055>"Rejoice<s%> with <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and be <S%H1523>glad<s%> for <S%H157>her,<s%> all you who love <S%H7797>her:<s%> rejoice for <S%H4885>joy<s%> with <S%H56>her,<s%> all you who mourn over her;

that you may <S%H3243>nurse<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> at the <S%H8575>comforting<s%> <S%H7699>breasts;<s%> that you may drink <S%H4711>deeply,<s%> and be <S%H6026>delighted<s%> with the <S%H2123>abundance<s%> of her <S%H3519>glory.<s%>"

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5186>"Behold,<s%> I will extend <S%H7965>peace<s%> to her like a <S%H5104>river,<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> like an <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H5158>stream:<s%> and you will <S%H3243>nurse.<s%> You will be <S%H5375>carried<s%> on her <S%H6654>side,<s%> and will be <S%H8173>dandled<s%> on her <S%H1290>knees.<s%>
As <S%H376>one<s%> whom his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H5162>comforts,<s%> so will I <S%H5162>comfort<s%> <S%H5162>you;<s%> and you will be comforted in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>"

You will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3820>it,<s%> and your heart shall <S%H7797>rejoice,<s%> and your <S%H6106>bones<s%> shall <S%H6524>flourish<s%> like the tender <S%H1877>grass:<s%> and the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall be <S%H3045>known<s%> toward his <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and he will have <S%H2194>indignation<s%> against his <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

<S%H3068>For,<s%> behold, Yahweh will <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and his <S%H4818>chariots<s%> shall be like the <S%H5492>whirlwind;<s%> to <S%H7725>render<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> with <S%H2534>fierceness,<s%> and his <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> with <S%H3851>flames<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>

For by <S%H784>fire<s%> will <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> execute <S%H8199>judgment,<s%> and by his <S%H2719>sword,<s%> on all <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> and the <S%H2491>slain<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall be <S%H7231>many.<s%>

"Those who <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> themselves and <S%H2891>purify<s%> themselves to go to the <S%H1593>gardens,<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst,<s%> <S%H398>eating<s%> <S%H2386>pig<s%>'s <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and the <S%H8263>abomination,<s%> and the <S%H5909>mouse,<s%> they shall come to an <S%H5486>end<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"For I know their <S%H4639>works<s%> and their <S%H4284>thoughts:<s%> the time <S%H935>comes,<s%> that I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> all <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H3956>languages;<s%> and they shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and shall <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

"I will <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H226>sign<s%> among <S%H7971>them,<s%> and I will send such as <S%H6412>escape<s%> of them to the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> to <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> <S%H6322>Pul,<s%> and <S%H3865>Lud,<s%> who <S%H4900>draw<s%> the <S%H7198>bow,<s%> to <S%H8422>Tubal<s%> and <S%H3120>Javan,<s%> to the <S%H339>islands<s%> afar <S%H7350>off,<s%> who have not <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H8088>fame,<s%> neither have <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H3519>glory;<s%> and they shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

They shall <S%H935>bring<s%> all your <S%H251>brothers<s%> out of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> for an <S%H4503>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and in <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and in <S%H6632>litters,<s%> and on <S%H6505>mules,<s%> and on <S%H3753>dromedaries,<s%> to my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> their <S%H4503>offering<s%> in a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Of them also will I <S%H3947>take<s%> for <S%H3548>priests<s%> and for <S%H3881>Levites,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"For as the <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H776>earth,<s%> which I will <S%H6213>make,<s%> shall <S%H5975>remain<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5002>me,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "so your <S%H2233>seed<s%> and your <S%H8034>name<s%> shall <S%H5975>remain.<s%>

It shall <S%H1767>happen,<s%> that from one new <S%H2320>moon<s%> to <S%H2320>another,<s%> and <S%H1767>from<s%> one <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> to <S%H7676>another,<s%> shall all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H559>me,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"They shall go <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H7200>look<s%> on the dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> who have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against <S%H8438>me:<s%> for their worm shall not <S%H4191>die,<s%> neither shall their <S%H784>fire<s%> be <S%H3518>quenched;<s%> and they will be <S%H1860>loathsome<s%> to all <S%H1320>mankind.<s%>"
